name: Dungeon Arena: Master In Training
description:
An Arena Wave based (Alpha-Demo) game.

WASD to move

Left click-for basic spells

Right click- for melee

Press Shift- to run

Press 1 Key- for Fireball spell

Press 2 Key- to disable melee and enable Fireslash spell

Press 3 Key- to enable super speed

Press 4 Key- to slow time down
